name: Meirkina
description:
Meirkina is a game I made for fun. It is a RPG type game. Explore, fight, and get better gear. This game is a prototype / early-alpha. It is indefinitely no where near complete. There will be huge updates weekly.

Controls; To Move: UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT. To Interact: Enter/Space.

For a guide, look at the crystal and press Enter.

If you find any bugs contact me at memeinaction@outlook.com
